name: salvebot
description: Enterprise AI chatbot platform with advanced RAG technology

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd salvebot-frontend && npm install && cd ../salvebot-backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf salvebot-frontend/node_modules salvebot-frontend/.next salvebot-frontend/out salvebot-backend/node_modules salvebot-backend/dist
scripts.test: concurrently "cd salvebot-frontend && npm test" "cd salvebot-backend && npm test"

author: Salvebot Inc.
